```{r}
library(fgm)
library(arcgisbinding)
arc.check_product()
```

# Study Area
Data for tests was taken from the Sinsinawa, IL study site. 

# ESRI File Geodatabase
Test data in ESRI ArcGIS file geodatabase format is stored in 
`fgm/inst/extdata/test.gdb`. 

Convert a file geodatabase feature class to an sp object
```{r}
sin_xs_points <- fgm::arc2sp("test.gdb/cross_section_points")
```
